author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: ر في الدّنیا وفَنائها لا تختار لنفسک إلّا نصرة أمر ربّک ولا یمنعک عن ذکره من علی الأرض أجمعین أن استقم ع
translation: Wert thou to consider this world, and realize how fleeting are the things that pertain unto it, thou wouldst choose to tread no path except the path of service to the Cause of thy Lord. None would have the power to deter thee from celebrating His praise, though all men should arise to oppose thee.
